Description: Head of an adult male mummy, identified as Meryrahashetef by Petrie, most of the linen wrappings and flesh do not survive, skull cracked, apparently found resting on the head-rest.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Bibliographic references: Fletcher, Antoine and Hill 2014 / Regarding the Dead: Human Remains in the British Museum (p.106, p.107, p.108, p.110, table 1)
